string-array.name: iowa_main_dish_descriptions
string-array.item: No, you\'re not allowed to use margarine in this recipe. In fact, it\'s illegal in the state of Iowa. You\'re welcome.
Add "walking" tacos to your daily exercise regimen!
If you can\'t bake it into a casserole, it was never worth eating in the first place. Keep the Iowa State Fair close to your heart with this dish.
Green bean casserole and meatballs: the heartwarming love story of two unlikely Midwestern favorites.
